FuncDef: The display bgp flow peer command displays BGP FlowSpec peer information.
Examples: Total number of peers : 1                 Peers in established state : 1
Peer        V    AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After BGP FlowSpec is enabled and a BGP FlowSpec peer relationship is established, you can run the display bgp flow peer command to query information about the BGP FlowSpec peer.
